sentences.sContent: ...a machine which, in some respects, was the forerunner of the modern helicopter.
sentences.sCn: …一台在某些方面是现代直升飞机的前身的机器。

remMethod.val: fore(在前面) + runner(跑步者) → 跑在前面的人 → 先驱者

trans.tranCn: 先驱者， 开路人； 先兆， 预兆
trans.tranOther: someone or something that existed before something similar that developed or came later
